value: Since they need the ability for their HR manager to update the Careers page they choose to use a CMS (User-configurable software) which will apparently make it very easy for a non technical user to update the page. The CEO of ABC Inc, does some initial research and finds that they could use opensource CMS such as WordPress to build their website quickly. They find an expert freelancer to setup their website.
